stories.text: The state of streaming today is bad because you have to pay so many different services. If Netflix could have somehow prevented competition would we be better off? The consumer could pay only one sub and watch everything there.
stories.title: Ask HN: Would we have been better off if Netflix maintained a monopoly?

stories.text: I find the entire edifice of Java Spring Boot  all the way down to gradle extraordinarily complex. Does it really have to be this complex?  What's the simplest API framework out there that doesn't require one to read multiple books to put together a simple internal app.
stories.title: Ask HN: Do you find the Java EE ecosystem complex?
